verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <WH5329> Lam-natz-tze-acho the chief Musician לְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> [Tle-da-Vidof David מִזְמ֑וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor; A Psalm אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei O God תְ֝הִלָּתִ֗י <WH8416> te-hil-la-Ti, of my praise אַֽל־ <WH408> 'al- not תֶּחֱרַֽשׁ׃ <WH2790> te-che-Rash. Hold not thy peace

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for פִ֪י <WH6310> fi For the mouth רָשָׁ֡ע <WH7563> ra-Sha' of the wicked וּֽפִי־ <WH6310> u-fi- and the mouth מִ֭רְמָה <WH4820> Mir-mah of the deceitful עָלַ֣י <WH5921> 'a-Lai against פָּתָ֑חוּ <WH6605> pa-Ta-chu; are opened דִּבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> dib-be-Ru against me they have spoken אִ֝תִּ֗י <WH854> 'it-Ti, against לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> le-Shon tongue שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> Sha-ker. against me with a lying

וְדִבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> ve-div-Rei me about also with words שִׂנְאָ֣ה <WH8135> sin-'Ah of hatred סְבָב֑וּנִי <WH5437> se-va-Vu-ni; They compassed וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֥וּנִי <WH3898> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu-ni and fought חִנָּֽם׃ <WH2600> chin-Nam. against me without a cause

תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> ta-chat- return אַהֲבָתִ֥י <WH160> 'a-ha-va-Ti For my love יִשְׂטְנ֗וּנִי <WH7853> yis-te-Nu-ni, they are my adversaries וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> va-'a-Ni I תְפִלָּֽה׃ <WH8605> te-fil-Lah. but I [give myself unto] prayer

וַיָּ֘שִׂ֤ימוּ <WH7760> vai-Ya-Si-mu And they have rewarded עָלַ֣י <WH5921> 'a-Lai and רָ֭עָה <WH7451> Ra-'ah me evil תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat Thahash טוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> to-Vah; for good וְ֝שִׂנְאָ֗ה <WH8135> ve-sin-'Ah, and hatred תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat Thahash אַהֲבָתִֽי׃ <WH160> 'a-ha-va-Ti. for my love

הַפְקֵ֣ד <WH6485> haf-Ked Set עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav over רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> ra-Sha'; thou a wicked man וְ֝שָׂטָ֗ן <WH7854> ve-sa-Tan, over him and let Satan יַעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> ya-'a-Mod stand עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <WH3225> ye-mi-No. at his right hand

בְּ֭הִשָּׁ֣פְטוֹ <WH8199> be-hish-Sha-fe-tov When he shall be judged יֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> ye-Tze let him be רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> ra-Sha'; condemned וּ֝תְפִלָּת֗וֹ <WH8605> u-te-fil-la-To, and let his prayer תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh become לַֽחֲטָאָֽה׃ <WH2401> La-cha-ta-'Ah. become sin

יִֽהְיֽוּ־ <WH1961> yih-yu- Let יָמָ֥יו <WH3117> ya-Mav Let his days מְעַטִּ֑ים <WH4592> me-'at-Tim; be few פְּ֝קֻדָּת֗וֹ <WH6486> pe-kud-da-To, his office יִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> yik-Kach take אַחֵֽר׃ <WH312> 'a-Cher. [and] let another

יִֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> yih-yu- Let בָנָ֥יו <WH1121> va-Nav Let his children יְתוֹמִ֑ים <WH3490> ye-to-Mim; be fatherless וְ֝אִשְׁתּוֹ <WH802> ve-'ish-to and his wife אַלְמָנָֽה׃ <WH490> 'al-ma-Nah. a widow

וְנ֤וֹעַ <WH5128> ve-No-a' be continually יָנ֣וּעוּ <WH5128> ya-Nu-'u vagabonds בָנָ֣יו <WH1121> va-Nav Let his children וְשִׁאֵ֑לוּ <WH7592> ve-shi-'E-lu; and beg וְ֝דָרְשׁ֗וּ <WH1875> ve-da-re-Shu, let them seek מֵחָרְבוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH2723> me-cha-re-vo-tei-Hem. [their bread] also out of their desolate places

יְנַקֵּ֣שׁ <WH5367> ye-nak-Kesh catch נ֭וֹשֶׁה <WH5383> Noo-sheh Let the extortioner לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after ל֑וֹ lo; וְיָבֹ֖זּוּ <WH962> ve-ya-Voz-zu spoil זָרִ֣ים <WH2114> za-Rim all that he hath and let the strangers יְגִיעֽוֹ׃ <WH3018> ye-gi-'O. his labour אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay יְהִי־ <WH1961> ye-hi- become

ל֭וֹ lo מֹשֵׁ֣ךְ <WH4900> mo-Shech Let there be none to extend חָ֑סֶד <WH2617> Cha-sed; mercy וְֽאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- Let there be none יְהִ֥י <WH1961> ye-Hi become ח֝וֹנֵ֗ן <WH2603> cho-Nen, unto him neither let there be any to favour לִיתוֹמָֽיו׃ <WH3490> li-to-Mav. his fatherless children

יְהִֽי־ <WH1961> ye-hi- Let אַחֲרִית֥וֹ <WH319> a-cha-ri-To Let his posterity לְהַכְרִ֑ית <WH3772> le-hach-Rit; be cut off בְּד֥וֹר <WH1755> be-Dor [and] in the generation אַ֝חֵ֗ר <WH312> 'a-Cher, following יִמַּ֥ח <WH4229> yim-Mach be blotted out שְׁמָֽם׃ <WH8034> she-Mam. let their name

יִזָּכֵ֤ר׀ <WH2142> yiz-za-Cher be remembered עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> 'a-Von Let the iniquity אֲ֭בֹתָיו <WH1> 'A-vo-tav of his fathers אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; with the LORD וְחַטַּ֥את <WH2403> ve-chat-Tat and let not the sin אִ֝מּ֗וֹ <WH517> im-Mo, of his mother אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay תִּמָּֽח׃ <WH4229> tim-Mach. be blotted out

יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu Let נֶֽגֶד־ <WH5048> ne-ged- them be before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Let them be before the LORD תָּמִ֑יד <WH8548> ta-Mid; continually וְיַכְרֵ֖ת <WH3772> ve-yach-Ret that he may cut off מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz of them from the earth זִכְרָֽם׃ <WH2143> zich-Ram. the memory

יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an, Because אֲשֶׁ֤ר׀ <WH834> 'a-Sher after לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo did not זָכַר֮ <WH2142> za-Char Because that he remembered עֲשׂ֪וֹת <WH6213> a-Sot not to shew חָ֥סֶד <WH2617> Cha-sed mercy וַיִּרְדֹּ֡ף <WH7291> vai-yir-Dof but persecuted אִישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- man עָנִ֣י <WH6041> 'a-Ni the poor וְ֭אֶבְיוֹן <WH34> Ve-'ev-yon and needy וְנִכְאֵ֨ה <WH5218> ve-nich-'Eh broken לֵבָ֬ב <WH3824> le-Vav in heart לְמוֹתֵֽת׃ <WH4191> le-mo-Tet. that he might even slay

וַיֶּאֱהַ֣ב <WH157> vai-ye-'e-Hav As he loved קְ֭לָלָה <WH7045> Ke-la-lah cursing וַתְּבוֹאֵ֑הוּ <WH935> vat-te-vo-'E-hu; so let it come וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- did not חָפֵ֥ץ <WH2654> cha-Fetz unto him as he delighted בִּ֝בְרָכָ֗ה <WH1293> biv-ra-Chah, not in blessing וַתִּרְחַ֥ק <WH7368> vat-tir-Chak so let it be far מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu. at

וַיִּלְבַּ֥שׁ <WH3847> vai-yil-Bash As he clothed קְלָלָ֗ה <WH7045> ke-la-Lah, himself with cursing כְּמַ֫דּ֥וֹ <WH4055> ke-Mad-Do like as with his garment וַתָּבֹ֣א <WH935> vat-ta-Vo so let it come כַמַּ֣יִם <WH4325> cham-Ma-yim like water בְּקִרְבּ֑וֹ <WH7130> be-kir-Bo; into his bowels וְ֝כַשֶּׁ֗מֶן <WH8081> ve-chash-She-men, and like oil בְּעַצְמוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH6106> be-'atz-mo-Tav. into his bones

תְּהִי־ <WH1961> te-hi- become ל֭וֹ lo כְּבֶ֣גֶד <WH899> ke-Ve-ged Let it be unto him as the garment יַעְטֶ֑ה <WH5844> ya'-Teh; [which] covereth וּ֝לְמֵ֗זַח <WH4206> u-le-Me-zach, him and for a girdle תָּמִ֥יד <WH8548> ta-Mid continually יַחְגְּרֶֽהָ׃ <WH2296> yach-ge-Re-ha. wherewith he is girded

זֹ֤את <WH2063> zot likewise פְּעֻלַּ֣ת <WH6468> pe-'ul-Lat [Let] this [be] the reward שֹׂ֭טְנַי <WH7853> te-nai of mine adversaries מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> me-'Et יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; from the LORD וְהַדֹּבְרִ֥ים <WH1696> ve-had-doe-Rim and of them that speak רָ֝֗ע <WH7451> Ra', evil עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> naf-Shi. against my soul

וְאַתָּ֤ה׀ <WH859> ve-'at-Tah O יְה֘וִ֤ה <WH3069> Yah-weh thou for me O GOD אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai, the Lord עֲ‍ ֽשֵׂה־ <WH6213> 'aseh- But do אִ֭תִּי <WH854> 'It-ti for לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an sake שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> she-Me-cha; for thy name's כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- Because ט֥וֹב <WH2896> Tov [is] good חַ֝סְדְּךָ֗ <WH2617> chas-de-cha, sake because thy mercy הַצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <WH5337> hatz-tzi-Le-ni. deliver

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For עָנִ֣י <WH6041> 'a-Ni For I [am] poor וְאֶבְי֣וֹן <WH34> ve-'ev-Yon and needy אָנֹ֑כִי <WH595> 'a-No-chi; and my וְ֝לִבִּ֗י <WH3820> ve-lib-Bi, and my heart חָלַ֥ל <WH2490> cha-Lal is wounded בְּקִרְבִּֽי׃ <WH7130> be-kir-Bi. within

כְּצֵל־ <WH6738> ke-tzel- like the shadow כִּנְטוֹת֥וֹ <WH5186> kin-to-To when it declineth נֶהֱלָ֑כְתִּי <WH1980> ne-he-La-che-ti; I am gone נִ֝נְעַ֗רְתִּי <WH5287> nin-'Ar-ti, I am tossed up and down כָּֽאַרְבֶּֽה׃ <WH697> Ka-'ar-Beh. as the locust

בִּ֭רְכַּי <WH1290> Bir-kai My knees כָּשְׁל֣וּ <WH3782> ka-she-Lu are weak מִצּ֑וֹם <WH6685> mitz-Tzom; through fasting וּ֝בְשָׂרִ֗י <WH1320> u-ve-sa-Ri, and my flesh כָּחַ֥שׁ <WH3584> ka-Chash faileth מִשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> mish-Sha-men. of fatness

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <WH589> va-'a-Ni I הָיִ֣יתִי <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti have become חֶרְפָּ֣ה <WH2781> cher-Pah I became also a reproach לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> la-Hem; they יִ֝רְא֗וּנִי <WH7200> yir-'U-ni, unto them [when] they looked יְנִיע֥וּן <WH5128> ye-ni-'Un upon me they shaked רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <WH7218> ro-Sham. their heads

עָ֭זְרֵנִי <WH5826> 'A-ze-re-ni Help יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh me O LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai; my God ה֭וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי <WH3467> ho-shi-'E-ni O save כְחַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH2617> che-chas-De-cha. me according to thy mercy

וְֽ֭יֵדְעוּ <WH3045> Ve-ye-de-'u That they may know כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for יָ֣דְךָ <WH3027> Ya-de-cha that this [is] thy hand זֹּ֑את <WH2063> Zot; likewise אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [that] thou LORD עֲשִׂיתָֽהּ׃ <WH6213> 'a-si-Tah. hast done

יְקַֽלְלוּ־ <WH7043> ye-kal-lu- Let them curse הֵמָּה֮ <WH1992> hem-Mah like וְאַתָּ֪ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah You תְבָ֫רֵ֥ךְ <WH1288> te-Va-Rech but bless קָ֤מוּ׀ <WH6965> Ka-mu thou when they arise וַיֵּבֹ֗שׁוּ <WH954> vai-ye-Vo-shu, let them be ashamed וְֽעַבְדְּךָ֥ <WH5650> ve-'av-de-Cha but let thy servant יִשְׂמָֽח׃ <WH8055> yis-Mach. rejoice

יִלְבְּשׁ֣וּ <WH3847> yil-be-Shu be clothed שׂוֹטְנַ֣י <WH7853> sot-Nai Let mine adversaries כְּלִמָּ֑ה <WH3639> ke-lim-Mah; with shame וְיַעֲט֖וּ <WH5844> ve-ya-'a-Tu and let them cover כַמְעִ֣יל <WH4598> cham-'Il as with a mantle בָּשְׁתָּֽם׃ <WH1322> ba-she-Tam. themselves with their own confusion

א֘וֹדֶ֤ה <WH3034> o-Deh praise יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD מְאֹ֣ד <WH3966> me-'Od I will greatly בְּפִ֑י <WH6310> be-Fi; with my mouth וּבְת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> u-ve-Toch him among רַבִּ֣ים <WH7227> rab-Bim the multitude אֲהַֽלְלֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH1984> 'a-Hal-Len-nu. yea I will praise

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for יַ֭עֲמֹד <WH5975> Ya-'a-mod For he shall stand לִימִ֣ין <WH3225> li-Min at the right hand אֶבְי֑וֹן <WH34> ev-Yon; of the poor לְ֝הוֹשִׁ֗יעַ <WH3467> le-ho-Shi-a', to save מִשֹּׁפְטֵ֥י <WH8199> mish-sho-fe-Tei [him] from those that condemn נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> naf-Sho. his soul
